topics.body:
I thought of something; I would want to be truly immortal for shits and giggles.

What would be fun is chopping off a arm without the hand or a leg without the feet and leaving them in small towns where nothing happens and have all the parts of yourself equally all the same age and every couple days leaving a body part somewhere so that the town thinks someone's getting hacked up.  It would cause quite the media stir.

Or you could walk into McDonalds with a knife in your skull acting as though you have no idea it's there and whenever they point it out go "is there something on the back on my head?" and just yank it out.  I think it would cause quite a lot of people to faint.

Or you could be a literal headless horseman for Halloween.
